Code

The code tag wraps blocks of code.

The kbd tag instructs users to open new tabs with Ctrl + T

The pre tag wraps the following preformatted block of JavaScript:

document.print('Hello World!');

The o-code-block class adds line numbers to the following pre block, provided each line is wrapped with a span tag:

<!doctype html>
<html><head>
</head><body>
</body></html>

The o-cli-block class adds the command line indicator $ to the following pre block: 

git clone git@github.com:ryanvfung/html.git

The o-cmd-block class adds the command indicator > to the following pre block: 

run_this_function();

Quadratic Equation

The solution to the equation: a x 2 + b + c = 0 is given by the equation: x = - b ± b 2 - 4 a c 2 ⁢ a
